wiki.content: The You Don't Know Me Songfacts reports that Texas songwriter Cindy Walker wrote this with Eddy Arnold, who recorded it in 1956. Walker and Arnold were very successful Country songwriters. This became a hit when Charles recorded it in 1962. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The You Don't Know Me Songfacts reports that Texas songwriter Cindy Walker wrote this with Eddy Arnold, who recorded it in 1956. Walker and Arnold were very successful Country songwriters. This became a hit when Charles recorded it in 1962.

track.name: You Don't Know Me
